welcome.en:
Hello! ğŸ‘‹ This bot gives you access to the best AI models for text, documents, images, video, and music generation.

New models available: OpenAI o3, o4 mini, GPTâ€‘4o, DeepSeek, Claude 4.5, /Midjourney, /StableDiffusion, Flux, Kling, /Suno, Perplexity and others.

Free: GPT 5 mini and Gemini 2.5 Flash.

The bot can:
â€¢ Write and translate texts ğŸ“
â€¢ Generate images and video ğŸŒ…ğŸ¬
â€¢ Work with documents ğŸ—‚
â€¢ Write and debug code âŒ¨
â€¢ Solve math problems ğŸ§®
â€¢ Create music and songs ğŸ¸
â€¢ Edit and OCR photos ğŸ–Œ
â€¢ Write papers: theses, essays, reports, books, and presentations ğŸ“
â€¢ TTS and audio transcription ğŸ™

ğŸ“ TEXT: write a question or send a voice message (choose model in /model).
â€¢ /i + question â€” web search

ğŸŒ… IMAGES: use /imagine + description (/Midjourney, /StableDiffusion, Flux and DALLÂ·E 3 â€” in /premium).

ğŸ¬ VIDEO: /video â€” generate clips (available in /Kling, Veo3).

ğŸ¸ MUSIC: /music â€” choose genre and add lyrics (available in /Suno).

â¡ï¸ FORWARDED MSG: forward messages to the bot for analysis, rewriting, etc.

ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦ GROUPS: add bot to a group and use /ask + your question.

ğŸ“š HELP: /help â€” full list of functions, commands, and instructions.
